data.title: Top to Bottom Mid Cascade
data.description: Use this Cascade lineup to take control of Mid, forcing attackers to the side.

data.title: Early B Main Stairs Cascade
data.description: Block off attackers from B Main, allowing you to grab orb and set up for an aggressive defense.

data.title: Early A Main Cascade Control
data.description: Quickly take control of A Main, setting you up to take orb and blocking off attackers with this Cascade lineup.
